title: minecraft:behavior.slime_float
description: Allow slimes to float in water / lava. Can only be used by Slime and Magma Cubes.

jump_chance_percentage.description: Percent chance a slime or magma cube has to jump while in water / lava. Default value: 0.8.

speed_multiplier.description: Determines the multiplier the entity's speed is modified by when moving through water / lava. Default value: 1.2.
